title: 27'' is burning my retina plz help
body:
hey fellas,
* I got this new iMac i can't seemed to be able to toggle from full screen to windowed ( it goes windowed but still on a full screen )... any thoughts? is it possible to play league not on a full screen on a mac??

replies.body:
You're able to change your *windowed mode* in-game under the **VIDEO** settings. If you're still seeing completely fullscreen when selecting a window mode, try hitting **Control+Command+F** to see if you were toggled into fullscreen from the Mac side.

Let me know if this helped!
